title: Best Keen Game?
content: I was going to have it listed at each episode, but the forum won't let me have more than 5 entries, and Keen 1-3 or 4-5 can be seen as one game in a sense, like the Lord of the Rings parts as one book.

title: Re: Best Keen Game?
content:
I think my opinion this keeps changing from time to time, but right now I voted the Invasion of the Vorticons. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img]

[img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-yorp.gif[/img] [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-garg.gif[/img] 3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Best Keen Game?
content:
1,2,3; they're the best for me!Szevvy Forever!
And Spleen never!

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.jpg[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Best Keen Game?
content: lol, I thought the Keen Voting booth was just for the awards, but now that I see how many Keen polls there, mine is kind of an old topic, lol

title: Re: Best Keen Game?
content:
